code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ControlSection=_ref=>{let{title,content}=_ref;const[isCollapsed,setIsCollapsed]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"control-section mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"control-header flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer",onClick:()=>setIsCollapsed(!isCollapsed),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-semibold text-gray-700",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-500",children:isCollapsed?'▼':'▲'})]}),!isCollapsed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4",children:content})]});};export default ControlSection;
